level.heading: LIABILITY FOR CONDUCT OF EMPLOYEES (ยง 31-517)

level.text: 517.1 The owners of a taxicab company, association, or fleet shall supervisend be responsible for the conduct of all its employees, affiliates,ontractors, and agents. The conduct for which each owner shall be responsiblencludes ensuring that the taxicabs of the company, association, or fleet are:
Operated in a safe and operational manner at all times; and
Operated by an operator who is not impaired by alcohol or drugs.
